---

## Description
As a team, we have been asked to generate a quarterly metrics report for our VA stakeholder so that they can communicate to others in the VA how are applications are performing.

## Tasks
- Retrieve the metrics for the last quarter (see [instructions here](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/products/health-care/checkin/analytics/how-to-generate-analytics-report-for-stakeholders.md#format-and-metrics-to-report))
- Send the metrics in the requested format per the instructions
